main event: A witness observed a tail-shaped object, white in color, moving slowly without sound over a period of 5 minutes on July 18, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 100-500 feet and appeared to move in a straight line at approximately 20 mph., There were no other reported sightings in the area at that time for further analysis., The object did not emit any smoke or leave a trail., It exhibited no flashing or blinking lights., The duration of the sighting was 5 minutes.
witness description: The witness is a professional writer, trained to be skeptical about unsubstantiate stories.
